Just D/L this app so will update with future use. ITM very easy install; good communication with other phone; sends pic's and emojis - no gifs or stickers, no big deal AFAIC. One immediate major problem for both users is the apparent inability to delete history/conversations... without that tool we may have to uninstall, which is a shame. UPDATE: Deleted as unusable with Chromebook - no auto-rotate. GOOGLE! Remove ALL apps without auto-rotate from Chromebook Store ASAP!

Very handy on airplanes. Pair with another phone (in Bluetooth settings), set your name and start chatting. Feels exactly like SMS. It even lets you send the app's APK via Bluetooth if the other person doesn't have it and you don't have Internet. The features it has work great -- it's the features it doesn't that keep this at 3 stars. There is no group chat at all, and you have to stop chatting with one person (and prevent them from messaging you) in order to start chatting with someone else.
Really useful app. I used it during a long haul flight where I was separated from my partner and it worked flawlessly
Simply does not work at all. No devices found.
Works as expected for simple text messages. Kept failing when sending images.
Awesome app!! no ads

Great app for offline connect, a clean interface, no ads.... -1 for needing to reconnect manually if out of range of other device... Should directly reconnect since permission is given. Also, if out of range.. Since its a P2P the message should queue and get sent once reconnected. Dev pl
I just like this website

This is the best Bluetooth chat app I have found. There are no ads or purchases and it was so easy to setup. I have tried multiple other apps like this and they all had some problem and some didn't even work at all. Plus it's open source? And you can easily share the APK with others even with no WiFi. Since most users will be using this only within the Bluetooth range anyway, it doesn't matter that you will need to reconnect every time you go out of range. I will definitely recommend this app!

This app is AWESOME! It's like real texting via Bluetooth. You can send pics through the app too which is a plus. Great app. Great design and set up. A+

This is a great bluetooth messaging app that works offline, it has good range. Very easy setup. Sending a quick text messages and large file size pictures a breeze. AD free and open-source! A must have app if the wifi/data go down, send the .apk to another android mobile to communicate. An excellent bluetooth messaging app to communicate with a family member or friend on trains, airplanes, camping, schools/colleges/work that do not have wifi/data. It would be great to have group (or mesh network) messaging option, at present only P2P or 1 to 1 chat capability. It would also be great to have cross-platform with iOS and Signal Protocol encryption.

Very well developed app and works pretty well first time. Shame that the last update was from 2019. Well, the app is simple enough and don't really need excessive updates like apps nowadays, but I hope it will still support for newer Android versions in the future. Perfect for an offline chat if the Internet ever crashed and or something happened in the future that we didn't know..
If you sitting away from your partner in flight, this is the best app to communicate. Worked without any issues.

Looks like this is the only Bluetooth chat app on Google Play that have no ads or purchases, is well designed and easy to use. I've scrolled through all of them untill my finger started to hurt, but haven't found anything better. Personally, I use it on train to text my girlfriend something, that I don't want to say in presence of other passengers, and other similar situations. In my country trains don't have WiFi and 95% of the way even cellular signal is completely unavailable.

Group message is a great idea for the next update. The ability to send group messages with a timeout waiting period to respond or else dropout on the group but can rejoin later option. And for the recipient, an ability to join group conversations (active) with an invite of course from hosts group. There should be a leadership on group (all access vs limited) and callouts (banners if important marquee msg are to put out) ex. Meet up at Recess for group huddle.   For the Version (1.0.2) stable on GSamsung S6. No incoherent behavior yet. love it, don't lose it 1.0.2! Ability to downgrade for those unstable updates is a must. Now I just need to figure out how to extend my Bluetooth range (hardware??, any suggestions?) hint, hint, wink!?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, I don't have any plans for group chats right now, it seems a quite big piece of work. There is no way to downgrade apps through Google Play but you can find all releases on GitHub - https://github.com/glodanif/BluetoothChat/releases. And I have no idea about Bluetooth range extension.

google_play_reviews.content: Wow,nicely done the only issue is range but the chat service actually works when connected and its fast

This is an excellent super lightweight tool to have when you want to chat with your spouse inside an airplane when your family with kids are unfortunately assigned separate seats -- You don't have internet wifi, nor do you want to tell across the aisles to tell eachother something ..... I have tired all of these Bluetooth chat apps.... This one is the best.  Well done.  Only thing I'd prefer is to get rid of the ugly green backdrop.... I prefer black background and cyan fonts!
Wow, you almost made it like Android Messaging app
Is this app a replacement for the main example of BT Chat from Android Studio?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I wouldn't say it's a replacement, it's a standalone application, but yes, I used Android Studio example as a base for this app.
